content: <?xml version="1.0"?> <rdf:RDF   xmlns:rdf="http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#"   xmlns:dc="http://purl.org/dc/elements/1.1/"   xmlns:atom="http://www.w3.org/2005/Atom"   xmlns="http://purl.org/rss/1.0/" >  <channel rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT&v=1.0">  <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?RSS&L=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT&v=1.0</dc:identifier>  <title>MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT List</title>  <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk/cgi-bin/webadmin?A0=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT</link>  <description>MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT List Archives</description>  <dc:date>2014-09-01T08:32:16Z</dc:date>  <image rdf:resource="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif"/>    <items>   <rdf:Seq>     <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;f191c071.1409"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;664642fe.1408"/> <rdf:li resource="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;5db1b67d.1408"/>     </rdf:Seq>  </items>   </channel>  <image rdf:about="http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif">     <title>Powered by L-Soft's LISTSERV mailing list manager</title>     <link>http://www.lsoft.com/products/listserv-powered.asp</link>     <url>http://www.lsoft.com/images/listserv_small.gif</url> </image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;f191c071.1409">   <title>FW: Citizen Maths </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;f191c071.1409</link>   <description> Hi,<br><br>Just FYI - this new online course might be of interest, based on the Google<br>platform. Not sure how they intend to assess progress . though clearly an<br>opportunity for some e-assessment, definitely worth watching:<br><br>http://citizenmaths.com<br><br>;-)<br><br>Kenji<br><br>-----Original Message-----<br>From: Curriculum Champions On Behalf Of Seb Schmoller<br>Sent: 01 September 2014 09:58<br><br>Dear all,<br><br>Last week the team behind Citizen Maths (a free open online Maths course at<br>level 2) launched &lt;http://citizenmaths.com/&gt; http://citizenmaths.com/ [...]    </description>   <dc:date>2014-09-01T10:30:14+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kenji Lamb</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;f191c071.1409</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;664642fe.1408">   <title>REMINDER: Innovative mathematics e-assessment in STEM </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;664642fe.1408</link>   <description> Just under three weeks to go until our day workshop in Leeds on &quot;Innovative<br>mathematics e-assessment in the STEM subjects&quot;, on 16 September at the<br>University of Leeds. This workshop will give you an opportunity to find out<br>about new ideas in maths e-assessment and meet with colleagues from around<br>the UK. Speakers come from across the country, and one will be broadcasting<br>live from the States. We are about half-full now, so please find more<br>details and book your place soon at http://ow.ly/A3UmP.   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-27T16:25:45+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Philip Walker</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;664642fe.1408</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;5db1b67d.1408">   <title>Innovative mathematics e-assessment in STEM, Leeds, 16 September </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;5db1b67d.1408</link>   <description> Given you are on this list, it is fair to assume you have an interest in<br>mathematics e-assessment. I trust that you will find &quot;Innovative<br>mathematics e-assessment in the STEM subjects&quot; is for you. We will be<br>hearing from colleagues around England, and also from a colleague in the<br>United States via video link, about various innovations which have<br>mathematics e-assessment at their heart: some technical, some educational,<br>all aimed at improving students' educational experience. It promises to be<br>a day with lots of ideas to take away and think on for your own practice. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-08-08T10:47:51+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Philip Walker</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=MATHS-E-ASSESSMENT;5db1b67d.1408</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
